医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
阐明孩子如何继承父母的压力经历我们大多数人在高中时就了解到，人们的基因一半来自父亲，一半来自母亲。确实如此，但事实证明，父母对后代遗传的贡献方式更加复杂，也更加有趣。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Illuminating-how-children-inherit-parentse28099-stressful-experiences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Illuminating-how-children-inherit-parentse28099-stressful-experiences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6bff00b9-47c0-43c4-9421-28120617b25e Tue, 27 Jun 2023 21:21:43 -0400 Illuminating how children inherit parents’ stressful experiences
AI模型可以帮助医生确定前列腺癌的范围一项新的研究表明，由加州大学洛杉矶分校琼森综合癌症中心和加州大学洛杉矶分校泌尿科的研究人员共同开发的人工智能（AI）模型可以帮助医生确定前列腺内癌症的程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/AI-model-can-help-doctors-define-the-extent-of-cancer-within-the-prostate.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/AI-model-can-help-doctors-define-the-extent-of-cancer-within-the-prostate.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bd2b939-34f0-4a41-824b-aa9648a4306a Tue, 27 Jun 2023 21:14:47 -0400 AI model can help doctors determine the extent of cancer within the prostate
少量或适量饮酒并不能预防内分泌疾病根据内分泌学会临床内分泌与代谢杂志上发表的一项新研究，每天只喝一两杯饮料的人无法预防肥胖和 2 型糖尿病等内分泌疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Light-or-moderate-alcohol-conspiration-does-not-protect-against-endocrine-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Light-or-moderate-alcohol-conspiration-does-not-protect-against-endocrine-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82598f90-c5ee-49cd-8ee8-780c7e9a9577 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 21:09:22 -0400 Light or moderate alcohol consumption does not protect against endocrine conditions
研究表明限制蛋氨酸可有效逆转老年肥胖一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 11 期，题为“Old-age-induced肥胖逆转C57BL/6 小鼠缺乏蛋氨酸的饮食或口服产生重组蛋氨酸酶的大肠杆菌。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Research-shows-the-efficacy-of-methionine-restriction-to-reverse-old-age-induced-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Research-shows-the-efficacy-of-methionine-restriction-to-reverse-old-age-induced-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9f47fb5-8cc7-4fb4-b8df-47d26bae60bf Tue, 27 Jun 2023 20:48:00 -0400 Research shows the efficacy of methionine restriction to reverse old-age-induced obesity
UTHSC 团队准备对弱势癌症患者产生现实影响在田纳西州的新支持下，田纳西大学健康科学中心的一个研究小组准备对弱势癌症患者产生现实影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/UTHSC-team-poished-to-make-a-real-world-impact-on-vulnerable-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/UTHSC-team-poished-to-make-a-real-world-impact-on-vulnerable-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8eafc091-2040-4754-a290-a0e5eb2843ce Tue, 27 Jun 2023 20:43:22 -0400 UTHSC team poised to make a real-world impact on vulnerable cancer patients
确定男性早发结直肠癌的七个危险因素50 岁及以上人群的结直肠癌发病率和死亡率正在下降，但 50 岁以下人群的发病率和死亡率正在上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Seven-risk-factors-for-early-onset-colorectal-cancer-in-males-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Seven-risk-factors-for-early-onset-colorectal-cancer-in-males-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7660728c-e39a-4ce2-9c7a-fcf2321a0678 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 14:26:06 -0400 Seven risk factors for early onset colorectal cancer in males identified
高诊断准确率的AI算法有助于提高肺癌检测水平根据北美放射学会杂志《放射学》发表的一项研究，具有高诊断准确性的人工智能 (AI) 算法的协助提高了放射科医生在胸部 X 光检查肺癌方面的表现，并提高了人们对人工智能建议的接受度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/AI-algorithm-with-high-diagnostic-accuracy-helps-improve-lung-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/AI-algorithm-with-high-diagnostic-accuracy-helps-improve-lung-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=547fa14f-5c10-42f5-a422-ff42350a2268 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 14:21:12 -0400 AI algorithm with high diagnostic accuracy helps improve lung cancer detection
研究表明，在贫困中长大可能会影响孩子的大脑线路圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院的一项新研究表明，在贫困中长大可能会影响孩子大脑的连接。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Growing-up-in-poverty-may-influence-the-wiring-of-a-childs-brain-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Growing-up-in-poverty-may-influence-the-wiring-of-a-childs-brain-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8028417-d07c-4e26-9173-3401c4783b81 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 14:14:51 -0400 Growing up in poverty may influence the wiring of a child's brain, study suggests
通过增加处方阿片类止痛药的使用可减少阿片类药物过量死亡罗格斯大学的一项研究表明，增加处方阿片类止痛药的使用可能会减少美国阿片类药物过量死亡的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Opioid-overdose-deaths-may-be-reduced-by-increasing-access-to-prescription-opioid-painkillers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Opioid-overdose-deaths-may-be-reduced-by-increasing-access-to-prescription-opioid-painkillers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1039add3-8812-442c-8a6c-402a9d686df9 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 14:10:32 -0400 Opioid overdose deaths may be reduced by increasing access to prescription opioid painkillers
使用脑成像技术识别重度抑郁症的多种亚型重度抑郁症 (MDD) 不仅是最常见的精神疾病之一，影响超过 8% 的美国人，而且每个人的病情差异也很大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Multiple-subtypes-of-major-depressive-disorder-identified-using-brain-imaging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Multiple-subtypes-of-major-depressive-disorder-identified-using-brain-imaging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bc57363-a51a-467e-8bfd-b6b944fb7173 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 14:02:47 -0400 Multiple subtypes of major depressive disorder identified using brain imaging
